name: StarShipRun 2
description:
Description: This is a game where me and my team had a week to make a new mechanic for a game. Our mechanic is a guided missile. This is the demo for it.

Tutorial: At the start of the game click E to switch to the rocket.

Controls:

Rocket:

E - Switch to rocket

WASD - Move

Spaceship:

ArrowKeys Left & Right - Move

STARSHIPRUN 2 BABY!
